title: PUCSL approves shorter power cuts today
body_lines: Electricity regulator the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) said the power cuts were being imposed on the request of the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) today as well.

Groups A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, and L will face a two-hour and 30-minute power cut between 8 a.m. and 6 p.m. whilst a one hour and 15-minute power cuts will be imposed between 6 p.m. and 11 p.m.
In addition, groups P, Q, R, S, T, U, V, W will experience a two-hour power cut between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. and one hour between 5 p.m. and 9 p.m.
